DOC.brief_summary: An open label extension MORAb-003-002 study order continue active patient MORAb-003-002 study maintenance MORAb-003 infusion main study close .
DOC.brief_title: An Open Label Extension Study Efficacy MORAb-003
DOC.criteria: Provision Informed consent Subjects must enrol met inclusion/exclusion criterion MORAb003002 study . Subjects must achieve normalization CA 125 level and/or CR PR ( stable disease investigator 's assessment clinical benefit ) MORAb003 combination standard chemotherapy yet meet criterion disease progression participation MORAb003002 study . Subjects must currently receive singleagent MORAb003 maintenance therapy . Subjects discontinue MORAb003002 study reason .
